content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: AGEU
      operator: non_empty
    - name: AGE
      operator: empty
    - name: AGETXT
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000122
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when both AGETXT and AGE are empty, but AGEU is populated.
Outcome:
  Message: AGEU not empty, but AGE empty and AGETXT empty
  Output Variables:
    - AGE
    - AGEU
    - AGETXT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0434
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of AGE or AGETXT.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: AGEU
                Section: Demographics
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Raise an error when both AGETXT and AGE are empty, but AGEU is populated.

Outcome.Message: AGEU not empty, but AGE empty and AGETXT empty

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Variable Qualifier of AGE or AGETXT.
